name: Bigfoot: The Secret Life
detailed_description: Bigfoot: The Secret Life - an elementary 2D platformer with elements of survival in which you pass quite difficult levels, playing for an Bigfoot. The essence of this game is very simple, you need to collect all the items on the level and not die. But be careful, you can meet a variety of obstacles, such as other obstacles, traps, and so on. Once you collect all the items on the level, you will see the door to the home of the Bigfoot, passing through which you will find yourself on another level. Don't turn off the right way. Good luck!
